braidword documentation¶

class moore_braidgenerator.braidword.BraidWord(**kwargs)¶

Encapsulation of a mathematical braid. BraidWord contains a word which consists of a list of generators and is a component to be used in the MarkovChain.

Parameters

initword (list) – List containing generators to be used as initial word.

word¶

word of BraidWord, made up of list containing integer generators.

Type

list

largestGenerator¶

Largest generator in word.

Type

int

genCount¶

Array of quantity of generators in word.

Type

list

canCancel(index) → bool¶

Boolean stating if cancel at index is a valid move.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where canCancel is to be checked.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

canDestabilize() → bool¶

Returns a boolean stating if self.destabilize() is a valid move. For consistent Markov probabilities we only consider search for largestGenerator to exist at the end of word.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

canFlip(index: int) → bool¶

Boolean stating if flip at index is a valid move.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where canFlip is to be checked.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

canTranspose(index) → bool¶

Boolean stating if transpose at index is a valid move.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where canTranspose is to be checked.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

cancel(index) → bool¶

Performs a cancelation of the generators at index and (index+1)%length and decreases self.length by 2. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where cancel is to be performed.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

conjugate(index) → bool¶

Conjugate the word by amount. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where conjugate is to be performed.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

destabilize() → bool¶

Destabilize the braid word and decrease self.length by 1, and possibly decrease self.largestGenerator. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

flip(index: int) → bool¶

Flips generators at index, (index+1)%length, and (index+2)%length. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where flip is to be performed.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

insert(index, generator) → bool¶

Insert a generator and its inverse into word. Will insert the given generator and its inverse at index and increases self.length by 2. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

  • index (int) – Index where cancel is to be performed.

  • generator (int) – Generator to insert into word.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

length() → int¶

Dynamically returns the length of the word.

Returns

Return type

Length of the word.

stabilize() → bool¶

Stabilize the braid word, increase self.length by 1, and increase self.largestGenerator. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.

transpose(index) → bool¶

Transposes generators at index and (index+1)%length. Returns boolean to trigger logs in MarkovChain if True.

Parameters

index (int) – Index where transpose is to be performed.

Returns

Return type

True if successful at index, False otherwise.
